snippet.title: Starlight Attack - Teaser
snippet.description:
Starlight Attack is an upcoming 2D hand-animated space shooter; styled like a classic arcade game!

Fly through space and fight off all sorts of aliens, robots and monsters in a race to save your home planet: 'Starlight' - which has been shrunk and stolen with everyone still on it!

Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/nENFXZB

Features:
- Gorgeous hand drawn animation and art!
- A snappy techno soundtrack to get your heart pumpin’!
- Classic arcade styled action!
- Big, menacing bosses to take down!
- Bosses strike back with a PINCH mode for extra challenge, if you defeat them without taking damage!
- Create your own levels with a built-in level editor!
- Full controller support!

RETRIEVE YOUR PLANET!
